{{Description|Jumpy Dumpty is Klee's good friend! She can't help but introduce him to everyone.}}
'''Jumpy Dumpty''' is [[Klee]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|particles|at least one bounce|4}}
** The mines don't generate Elemental Particles.
* {{TalentNote|icd|Jumpy Dumpty DMG|2.5|3|Mine DMG}}
** This ICD is also shared with Klee's [[Kaboom!|Normal Attacks]].
* '''8''' mines are produced.
* The mines generated by this skill can be [[Vacuum Field|grouped up]] by [[Jean]]/[[Kazuha]]/[[Sucrose]]/[[Traveler (Anemo)]]'s Elemental Skills.
** This does not occur with [[Venti]]'s Elemental Skill and Burst.
** Kazuha's Elemental Skill will also alter the course of Jumpy Dumpty, making it bounce on the spot.
* When a second Jumpy Dumpty is thrown and produces mines, the mines of the first will explode.
* {{TalentNote|character=Klee|talent=Jumpy Dumpty|ascension|1|Pounding Surprise}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|2|Explosive Frags}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|3|Exquisite Compound}}
